name: questionnaire

variables.name: next_button_label
variables.description: Label of button used to submit responses and progress forward

variables.name: order
variables.description:
Items order:

  • manual - will be set from order field of each item
  • random - every questionnaire run will have shuffled questions order

variables.name: items_per_page
variables.description: Maximum items that can be displayed on a single page

variables.name: response_required
variables.description: Check if all responses must be given

variables.name: no_response_alert
variables.description: Alert that will be shown when an item is left unanswered
variables.value: All questions need to be answered!

variables.name: can_go_back
variables.description: Check to allow participants to go back and change already given responses

variables.name: previous_button_label
variables.description: Label of button used to go back to page of items already answered

variables.name: time_limit
variables.description: Time limit in seconds. Use 0 for unlimited time.

variables.name: scores
variables.description:
R list of scores where each element is named after trait. For trait A, B will output:

  • scores$A
  • scores$B

params.label: Items order
params.description:
Items order:

  • manual - will be set from order field of each item
  • random - every questionnaire run will have shuffled questions order
